items.titolo: WIRED Roundup: AI Psychosis, Missing FTC Files, and Google Bedbugs
items.descrizione: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we run through the top stories of the week and look closely at people’s complaints to the FTC alleging that ChatGPT led them or loved ones into AI psychosis.

items.titolo: Mustafa Suleyman di Microsoft: “Non faremo mai chatbot erotici”
items.descrizione: Il CEO AI di Microsoft Suleyman dichiara che i chatbot erotici non sono nei programmi dell'azienda. Copilot è un assistente, non un compagno. The post Mustafa Suleyman di Microsoft: “Non faremo mai chatbot erotici”…

items.titolo: Grieving family uses AI chatbot to cut hospital bill from $195,000 to $33,000 — family says Claude highlighted duplicative charges, improper coding, and other violations
items.descrizione: Someone has explained how they used AI to slash hospital bills from hundreds to tens of thousands of dollars.
